mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.exam_paper_name AS "examPaperName", a.rule_id AS "examRule.id", a.exam_score AS "examScore", a.is_delete AS "isDelete",
b.id AS "course.id", b.couname AS "course.couname", b.couname AS "couname",
r.rule_name AS "examRuleName", r.rule_name AS "examRule.ruleName"
left join course b on b.id = a.couse_id left join examrule r on r.id = a.rule_id left join teacourse tc on tc.couid = b.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM exampaper a
a.is_delete = '0'
and b.couname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{couname},'%')
and a.couse_id = #{course.id}
and a.exam_paper_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{examPaperName},'%')
and r.rule_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{examRuleName},'%')
and tc.teaid = #{teaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exampaper( couse_id, exam_paper_name, rule_id, exam_score, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{course.id}, #{examPaperName}, #{examRule.id}, #{examScore}, 0 )
